text: @IvankaTrump Get rid of the Trump, Kushner Crime family, VOTE Nov 3 rd.  Trump doesn’t want the people to know the truth about the Coronavirus and the crooked stuff going on that’s why he fired Dr. Rick Bright.  Now he wants to silence Anthony Fauci.
